title: Is it possible to install the Mobdro app on an LG smart TV? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mobdro is the best app for streaming online on Smart Tv. Mobdro supported all smart Tv like Samsung Smart Tv, Para Smart Tv, LG Smart Tv, Sony Smart Tv. So you can use this app on LG Tv just following some steps. Just follow the given steps At first, you have connected the internet to your TV. You can use an ethernet cable or a strong WiFi signal. Go to Setting and click >>Network setting<< and then >> Connect to Wireless Network<<You can tap the Network and give the Network Password.Now you need to Download Mobdro app for LG smart tv from given linkYou may know that Mobdro Apk is not an official Apk. So your TV wants permission to allow unknown sources Apk. Now to do so: Click the SettingNow scroll down the page and tap on Personal and now click” Security and restriction” then click ” Unknown Sources“After ensuring that, you can go-ahead to install this TV Apk. Now you need to go to this folder where you download this Apk fileThen select this Apk and click on itOnce you installed this Apk, this App will add on your app list. Now it is ready to useTo get more information with the screenshot just follow this link. Reference Page: Mobdro for Smart Tv
